name: service_capacity
description: The details of service capacities for services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the service_capacity object. Each service_capacity must have a unique identifier.

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.title: Service Identifier
service_id.description: The identifier for the Service object associated with this service capacity object. Only required in the tabular representation.

unit_id.name: unit_id
unit_id.title: Unit ID
unit_id.description: The identifier for the unit object.

available.name: available
available.title: Available
available.description: The number of units available as of the last update.

maximum.name: maximum
maximum.title: Maximum
maximum.description: The maximum number of units that can be available for this service, if applicable

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A Human-Friendly description of this service capacity e.g. “Beds available for people experiencing homelessness”
description.example: Beds available for people experiencing homelessness.

updated.name: updated
updated.title: Date Updated
updated.description: The datetime when this service_capacit y object was last updated or changed. Should have millisecond accuracy.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
